mapper.select: select * from sec_doctor sd,sec_rank_dic srd,sec_doctor_multipoint sdm,sec_first_department sfd where sd.rank=srd.rank_code and sd.id=sdm.doctor_id and sfd.id=sdm.department_id and sfd.id=#{deptId}
select * from sec_doctor sd,sec_doctor_multipoint sdm, sec_hospital sh where sd.id=sdm.doctor_id and sdm.hospital_id=sh.id and sd.id=#{id}
